author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...IVO RACING WEST-NORTHWESTWARD OFF THE SOUTHWESTERN MEXICAN COASTLINE...
summary: ...IVO RACING WEST-NORTHWESTWARD OFF THE SOUTHWESTERN MEXICAN COASTLINE... As of 3:00 AM CST Thu Aug 07 the center of Ivo was located near 15.9, -103.0 with movement WNW at 23 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1008 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...IVO RACING WEST-NORTHWESTWARD OFF THE SOUTHWESTERN MEXICAN COASTLINE... As of 3:00 AM CST Thu Aug 07 the center of Ivo was located near 15.9, -103.0 with movement WNW at 23 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1008 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Ivo (EP4/EP092025)
